{"id":1505,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/shows/1505/one-piece","name":"One Piece","type":"Animation","language":"Japanese","genres":["Action","Adventure","Anime","Fantasy"],"status":"Running","runtime":25,"averageRuntime":26,"premiered":"1999-10-20","officialSite":"http://www.toei-anim.co.jp/tv/onep/","schedule":{"time":"09:30","days":["Sunday"]},"rating":{"average":9},"weight":95,"network":{"id":131,"name":"Fuji TV","country":{"name":"Japan","code":"JP","timezone":"Asia/Tokyo"}},"webChannel":null,"dvdCountry":null,"externals":{"tvrage":8205,"thetvdb":81797,"imdb":"tt0388629"},"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_portrait/128/320242.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/128/320242.jpg"},"summary":"

One Piece animation is based on the successful comic by Eiichiro Oda. The comic has sold more than 260 million copies. The success doesn't stop; the One Piece animation series is in its top 5 TV ratings for kids programs in Japan for past few years and the series' most recent feature film title \"One Piece Film Z\" which was released on December 2012 has gathered 5.6 million viewers so far. The success goes beyond borders; receives high popularity on animation at terrestrial channel in Taiwan, no.1 rating on animation at a DTT channel in France, received high popularity among age 3-13 on a terrestrial channel in Germany in year 2010. The animation series has been broadcasted in many parts of the world: USA, UK, Australia, France, Spain, Portugal, Germany, Italy, Greece, Turkey, Israel, South Korea, Taiwan, China, Hong Kong, Philippine, Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, Ecuador, Nicaragua, Chile, Mexico, Brazil, and etc.

","updated":1621034573,"_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/shows/1505"},"previousepisode":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/2091226"},"nextepisode":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/2091227"}},"_embedded":{"episodes":[{"id":256125,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256125/one-piece-1x01-im-luffy-the-man-whos-gonna-be-king-of-the-pirates","name":"I'm Luffy! The Man Who's Gonna Be King of the Pirates!","season":1,"number":1,"type":"regular","airdate":"1999-10-20","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"1999-10-20T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734143.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734143.jpg"},"summary":"

A band of pirates led by Alvida plundered a ship, only to find a barrel which contains a strange boy named Luffy. Luffy is on a quest to find the legendary treasure \"One Piece\" and he befriends the ship's cabin-boy, Koby, who actually wants to become a marine officer. Luffy defeats Alvida and the two journey on in search of crewmates.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256125"}}},{"id":256126,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256126/one-piece-1x02-enter-the-great-swordsman-pirate-hunter-roronoa-zoro","name":"Enter the Great Swordsman! Pirate Hunter Roronoa Zoro!","season":1,"number":2,"type":"regular","airdate":"1999-11-17","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"1999-11-17T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734144.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734144.jpg"},"summary":"

Luffy and Koby arrive at Shell Island, a Marine base. They meet the bounty hunter Roronoa Zoro, held under arrest by the infamous marine, Captain Morgan, and his son Helmeppo.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256126"}}},{"id":256127,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256127/one-piece-1x03-morgan-versus-luffy-whos-the-mysterious-pretty-girl","name":"Morgan versus Luffy! Who's the Mysterious Pretty Girl?","season":1,"number":3,"type":"regular","airdate":"1999-11-24","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"1999-11-24T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734145.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734145.jpg"},"summary":"

Luffy convinces Zoro to join his crew, but they must first defeat Captain Morgan. After freeing the island from Morgan's oppressive rule, Koby is accepted as a marine while the other two continue on their journey.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256127"}}},{"id":256128,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256128/one-piece-1x04-luffys-past-enter-red-haired-shanks","name":"Luffy's Past! Enter Red-Haired Shanks!","season":1,"number":4,"type":"regular","airdate":"1999-12-08","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"1999-12-08T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734146.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734146.jpg"},"summary":"

Out on the sea, Luffy almost loses his hat and reflects on his past, and how a pirate named Shanks influenced him. Afterwards, Luffy meets Nami, and Buggy the Clown's men.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256128"}}},{"id":256129,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256129/one-piece-1x05-a-terrifying-mysterious-power-captain-buggy-the-clown-pirate","name":"A Terrifying Mysterious Power! Captain Buggy, the Clown Pirate!","season":1,"number":5,"type":"regular","airdate":"1999-12-15","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"1999-12-15T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734147.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734147.jpg"},"summary":"

In order to save herself and steal a map to the Grand Line, Nami tricks Luffy into allowing her to turn him over to Buggy.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256129"}}},{"id":256130,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256130/one-piece-1x06-desperate-situation-beast-tamer-mohji-vs-luffy","name":"Desperate Situation! Beast Tamer Mohji vs. Luffy!","season":1,"number":6,"type":"regular","airdate":"1999-12-29","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"1999-12-29T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734148.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734148.jpg"},"summary":"

Mohji and Richie show up for revenge after Buggy's humiliating defeat in the previous episode, and Luffy meets a small dog guarding his master's store, even though he knows that he is long dead.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256130"}}},{"id":256131,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256131/one-piece-1x07-epic-showdown-swordsman-zoro-vs-acrobat-cabaji","name":"Epic Showdown! Swordsman Zoro vs. Acrobat Cabaji!","season":1,"number":7,"type":"regular","airdate":"1999-12-29","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"1999-12-29T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734149.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734149.jpg"},"summary":"

Enraged by the actions of Buggy's crew, the city's mayor rushes to fight Buggy himself, but the Straw Hat Pirates come to his rescue. Zoro fights Cabaji, despite still being wounded from his previous encounter with Buggy, while Luffy faces the clown pirate himself and Nami searches for the map to the Grand Line.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256131"}}},{"id":256132,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256132/one-piece-1x08-who-is-the-victor-devil-fruit-power-showdown","name":"Who is the Victor? Devil Fruit Power Showdown!","season":1,"number":8,"type":"regular","airdate":"1999-12-29","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"1999-12-29T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734150.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734150.jpg"},"summary":"

Buggy's link to Shanks is revealed, and when he rips the straw hat Shanks gave Luffy, his rage knows no bounds. Who will win in this clash between Devil Fruit users?

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256132"}}},{"id":256133,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256133/one-piece-1x09-the-honorable-liar-captain-usopp","name":"The Honorable Liar? Captain Usopp!","season":1,"number":9,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-01-12","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-01-12T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734151.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734151.jpg"},"summary":"

With Nami forming an alliance with the crew as their navigator (though not as an actual member), the crew arrives at the Syrup Village in search of a proper ship, where they meet the town liar, Usopp, who too has ties to Shanks.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256133"}}},{"id":256134,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256134/one-piece-1x10-the-weirdest-guy-ever-jango-the-hypnotist","name":"The Weirdest Guy Ever! Jango the Hypnotist!","season":1,"number":10,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-01-19","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-01-19T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734152.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734152.jpg"},"summary":"

When trying to convince his rich friend, Kaya, to give the Straw Hats a ship, Usopp is told to stay away from her by her caretaker, Klahadore. However, when Usopp and Luffy later see him conversing with a strange man, they learn of a plot to kill Kaya.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256134"}}},{"id":256135,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256135/one-piece-1x11-expose-the-plot-pirate-butler-captain-kuro","name":"Expose the Plot! Pirate Butler, Captain Kuro!","season":1,"number":11,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-01-26","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-01-26T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734153.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734153.jpg"},"summary":"

After learning of Captain Kuro's evil plan, Usopp runs back to the village to warn Kaya, only to find that after all his years of lying no one believes him.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256135"}}},{"id":256136,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256136/one-piece-1x12-clash-with-the-black-cat-pirates-the-great-battle-on-the-slope","name":"Clash with the Black Cat Pirates! The Great Battle on the Slope!","season":1,"number":12,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-02-02","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-02-02T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734154.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734154.jpg"},"summary":"

Usopp resolves to keep his story of pirates attacking the town a lie by making sure none reach it. Luffy, Zoro, Nami, and Usopp then try to keep the Black Cat Pirates at bay.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256136"}}},{"id":256137,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256137/one-piece-1x13-the-terrifying-duo-meowban-brothers-vs-zoro","name":"The Terrifying Duo! Meowban Brothers vs. Zoro!","season":1,"number":13,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-02-09","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-02-09T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734155.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734155.jpg"},"summary":"

The Straw Hats manage to take out most of the opposing Black Cat Pirates, so Jango orders the Nyaban Brothers to attack. Meanwhile, after getting hypnotized by Jango, Luffy gets himself stuck under the collapsed mast of the Black Cat Pirates' ship.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256137"}}},{"id":256138,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256138/one-piece-1x14-luffy-back-in-action-miss-kayas-desperate-resistance","name":"Luffy Back in Action! Miss Kaya's Desperate Resistance!","season":1,"number":14,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-02-16","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-02-16T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734156.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734156.jpg"},"summary":"

Captain Kuro himself arrives at the scene, and with Zoro too injured to fight, Luffy being incapacitated, and the other two being too weak to handle him, things seem hopeless. However, Kaya herself appears to bargain with Kuro.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256138"}}},{"id":256139,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256139/one-piece-1x15-beat-kuro-usopp-the-mans-tearful-resolve","name":"Beat Kuro! Usopp the Man's Tearful Resolve!","season":1,"number":15,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-02-23","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-02-23T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734157.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734157.jpg"},"summary":"

Zoro and Buchi (of the Nyaban Brothers) face off once again as Luffy and Kuro begin their fight. Usopp orders the Usopp Pirates to run away with Kaya, but Jango goes after them. A flashback reveals how Captain Kuro faked his death with Captain Morgan and how he became Kaya's butler.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256139"}}},{"id":256140,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256140/one-piece-1x16-protect-kaya-the-usopp-pirates-great-efforts","name":"Protect Kaya! The Usopp Pirates' Great Efforts!","season":1,"number":16,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-03-01","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-03-01T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734158.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734158.jpg"},"summary":"

As the fight between Luffy and Kuro is close to an end, the Usopp Pirates do their best to avoid Jango.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256140"}}},{"id":256141,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256141/one-piece-1x17-anger-explosion-kuro-vs-luffy-how-it-ends","name":"Anger Explosion! Kuro vs. Luffy! How it Ends!","season":1,"number":17,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-03-08","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-03-08T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734159.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734159.jpg"},"summary":"

Kuro's ultimate attack, \"Shakushi\", attacks everything in the area, whether friend or foe, and Luffy becomes enraged by his lack of regard for his crew. Will Luffy's determination overcome Kuro's sheer speed?

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256141"}}},{"id":256142,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256142/one-piece-1x18-youre-the-weird-creature-gaimon-and-his-strange-friends","name":"You're the Weird Creature! Gaimon and His Strange Friends!","season":1,"number":18,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-03-15","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-03-15T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734160.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734160.jpg"},"summary":"

With Usopp now in the crew and a new ship, the Going Merry, under their command, the Straw Hats head to an island said to hold a fabled treasure, only to encounter a strange man stuck in a treasure box that has also been looking for this treasure.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256142"}}},{"id":256143,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256143/one-piece-1x19-the-three-sword-styles-past-zoro-and-kuinas-vow","name":"The Three-Sword Style's Past! Zoro and Kuina's Vow!","season":1,"number":19,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-03-22","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-03-22T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734161.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734161.jpg"},"summary":"

While Usopp & Luffy fool around with the ship's cannon one day, Zoro dreams about his childhood and the promise he made to Kuina.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256143"}}},{"id":256144,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256144/one-piece-1x20-famous-cook-sanji-of-the-sea-restaurant","name":"Famous Cook! Sanji of the Sea Restaurant!","season":1,"number":20,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-04-12","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-04-12T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734162.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734162.jpg"},"summary":"

The crew meets Johnny and Yosaku, Zoro's former companions, and they set sail for the Baratie restaurant in search of a cook.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256144"}}},{"id":256145,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256145/one-piece-1x21-unwelcome-customer-sanjis-food-and-ghins-debt","name":"Unwelcome Customer! Sanji's Food and Ghin's Debt!","season":1,"number":21,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-04-12","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-04-12T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734163.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734163.jpg"},"summary":"

Sanji, a cook at the Baratie, helps a starving pirate named Gin. Luffy begins his job as a waiter to pay for the damage he did to the Baratie, and tries to convince Sanji to join his crew.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256145"}}},{"id":256146,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256146/one-piece-1x22-the-strongest-pirate-fleet-commodore-don-krieg","name":"The Strongest Pirate Fleet! Commodore Don Krieg!","season":1,"number":22,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-04-26","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-04-26T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734164.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734164.jpg"},"summary":"

Gin returns to the Baratie with his also-starving captain, Don Krieg, to whom Sanji once more gives food, but Don Krieg betrays the cook once he regains his energy.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256146"}}},{"id":256147,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256147/one-piece-1x23-protect-baratie-the-great-pirate-red-foot-zeff","name":"Protect Baratie! The Great Pirate, Red Foot Zeff!","season":1,"number":23,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-05-03","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-05-03T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734165.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734165.jpg"},"summary":"

It is revealed that Chef Zeff was a great pirate known as Red Leg Zeff. Gin explains the catastrophe the fleet met in Grand Line when they encountered Hawk-Eyes Mihawk, and Krieg attempts to take control of the Baratie.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256147"}}},{"id":256148,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256148/one-piece-1x24-hawk-eye-mihawk-the-great-swordsman-zoro-falls-at-sea","name":"Hawk-Eye Mihawk! The Great Swordsman Zoro Falls At Sea!","season":1,"number":24,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-05-10","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-05-10T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734166.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734166.jpg"},"summary":"

As Nami steals the Going Merry, Mihawk has returned to finish the job, but Zoro challenges him to a duel in order to achieve his dream.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256148"}}},{"id":256149,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256149/one-piece-1x25-the-emerge-of-the-super-kicking-skill-sanji-vs-the-iron-wall-pearl","name":"The Emerge of the Super Kicking Skill! Sanji vs. The Iron Wall Pearl","season":1,"number":25,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-05-17","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-05-17T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734167.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734167.jpg"},"summary":"

Mihawk leaves after defeating Zoro, so Krieg continues his invasion and has Pearl, one of his stronger crewmates, attack, and Sanji reveals his fighting skills. Meanwhile Johnny and Yosaku leave with Usopp and the wounded Zoro to go after Nami.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256149"}}},{"id":256150,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256150/one-piece-1x26-zeff-and-sanjis-dream-the-sea-of-dreams-all-blue","name":"Zeff and Sanji's Dream! The Sea of Dreams - All Blue","season":1,"number":26,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-05-24","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-05-24T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734168.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734168.jpg"},"summary":"

With Zeff held captive by Gin, Sanji has no choice but to take Pearl's hits, and he reflects on why Zeff means so much to him.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256150"}}},{"id":256151,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256151/one-piece-1x27-the-coldhearted-devil-man-gin-the-pirate-fleet-battle-commander","name":"The Coldhearted Devil-man. Gin, the Pirate Fleet Battle Commander","season":1,"number":27,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-05-31","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-05-31T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734169.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734169.jpg"},"summary":"

Gin finishes off Pearl, claiming that he wants to kill Sanji himself. Still wounded, Sanji faces Gin while Luffy attacks Don Krieg.

","_links":{"self":{"href":"https://api.tvmaze.com/episodes/256151"}}},{"id":256152,"url":"https://www.tvmaze.com/episodes/256152/one-piece-1x28-i-wont-die-conclusion-luffy-vs-krieg","name":"I Won't Die! Conclusion: Luffy vs. Krieg","season":1,"number":28,"type":"regular","airdate":"2000-06-07","airtime":"14:30","airstamp":"2000-06-07T05:30:00+00:00","runtime":25,"image":{"medium":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/medium_landscape/293/734171.jpg","original":"https://static.tvmaze.com/uploads/images/original_untouched/293/734171.jpg"},"summary":"

When Gin refuses to kill Sanji, Krieg uses a poison gas on him. Luffy seems to have the advantage in the fight until Krieg pulls out his explosive Battle Spear.
